glosses: To be approving, accepting; to approve, to be pleased with.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish راضی اولمق (rāżı olmaḳ, “to submit; to consent; to be satisfied or pleased with, to approve of”), from راضی (rāżı), equivalent to compound of razı (“approving, consenting, pleased with”) + olmak (“to be, to become”).
